list.name: Complete AWS Glue ETL
list.description: A complete example of an AWS Glue application that uses the [Serverless Framework](https://www.serverless.com/) to deploy the infrastructure and DevContainers and/or Docker Compose to run the application locally with AWS Glue Libs, Spark, Jupyter Notebook, AWS CLI, among other tools. It provides jobs using Python Shell and PySpark.
tags: Applications

list.name: AWS CloudWatch Evidently
list.description: A complete analysis of the service and a Proof of Concept on how to integrate it with a Node.js application.
tags: Examples > DevOps > A/B Testing

list.name: Feature flags post
list.description: How to progressively expose your features with feature flags by IAN BUCHANNAN.
tags: Examples > DevOps > A/B Testing

list.name: When to use shell
list.description: A guide from Google on when to use shell scripts.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Shell Scripting and CLI Tools

list.name: Easy Options
list.description: Easy options for shell scripts.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Shell Scripting and CLI Tools

list.name: Bash as a Wrapper Utility
list.description: Bash as a wrapper utility for other languages and tools.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Shell Scripting and CLI Tools

list.name: Bash as a Wrapper Utility with Easy Options
list.description: Bash as a wrapper utility for other languages and tools using Easy Options.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Shell Scripting and CLI Tools

list.name: Actionlint Playground
list.description: Static checker for GitHub Actions workflow files.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Continuous Integration, Delivery and Deployment

list.name: Markdown Lint
list.description: This workflow validates the Markdown files in the repository using the [markdownlint action](https://github.com/marketplace/actions/markdown-lint).
tags: Examples > DevOps > Continuous Integration, Delivery and Deployment

list.name: Shell Check
list.description: This workflow validates the shell scripts in the repository using the [shellcheck action](https://github.com/ludeeus/action-shellcheck).
tags: Examples > DevOps > Continuous Integration, Delivery and Deployment

list.name: Terraform Check
list.description: This workflow validates the Terraform files in the repository using the [terraform action](https://github.com/dflook/terraform-fmt-check).
tags: Examples > DevOps > Continuous Integration, Delivery and Deployment

list.name: Todo to Issue
list.description: This workflow scans new commits on the main branch looking for `TODO`s in the code and creates new GitHub issues.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Continuous Integration, Delivery and Deployment

list.name: Automation Seed example
list.description: Different workflows to validate the code and deploy an automation report page.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Continuous Integration, Delivery and Deployment

list.name: React Webpack Boilerplate
list.description: Different workflows to validate the code and deploy a React application.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Continuous Integration, Delivery and Deployment

list.name: AWS Glue using Docker and Docker Compose
list.description: Dockerfile and docker-compose.yml for AWS Glue development with AWS Glue Libs, Spark, Jupyter Notebook, AWS CLI among other tools.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Containers, Orchestration and Serverless > Containers and Compositions (Docker, Docker Compose, Buildpacks and more)

list.name: Localstack using Docker and Docker Compose
list.description: Dockerfile and docker-compose.yml to run Localstack locally with all the necessary services. This example also includes a script to create the necessary resources in Localstack. The provided examples are for DynamoDB, S3, SQS and Kinesis.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Containers, Orchestration and Serverless > Containers and Compositions (Docker, Docker Compose, Buildpacks and more)

list.name: MongoDB + Mongo Express using Docker and Docker Compose
list.description: Dockerfile and docker-compose.yml to run MongoDB and Mongo Express locally with initialization scripts.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Containers, Orchestration and Serverless > Containers and Compositions (Docker, Docker Compose, Buildpacks and more)

list.name: Microsoft SQL Server using Docker and Docker Compose
list.description: Dockerfile and docker-compose.yml to run Microsoft SQL Server locally with initialization scripts.

list.name: AWS Glue
list.description: DevContainer for AWS Glue development. Uses `docker-compose` to run VSCode attached to a container with all the necessary tools to develop AWS Glue jobs such us AWS Glue Libs, Spark, Jupyter Notebook, AWS CLI among other tools.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Containers, Orchestration and Serverless > DevContainers and Codespaces

list.name: Node.js
list.description: DevContainer for Node.js development. Uses `docker-compose` to run VSCode attached to a container with all the necessary tools to develop Node.js applications.
tags: Examples > DevOps > Containers, Orchestration and Serverless > DevContainers and Codespaces

list.name: Ingress

list.name: AWS AppSync + Python
list.description: Serverless Framework example to deploy an AWS AppSync API using Python. It also has a local development environment using [Serverless Offline](https://www.serverless.com/plugins/serverless-offline).

list.name: AWS Glue with Python Shell and PySpark Jobs
